featured.text: At the sanctuary, keepers now use recorded howler sounds from a distance so that the monkeys feel the need to make the territorial calls as they would do in the wild.
The territorial dispute can be back to the year 1917, when the two countries were at war.

definition.zh_def: 與領土或地區有關的；保護或捍衛某一特定區域的。
definition.en_def: Relating to a specific area of land or territory; often used to describe behavior aimed at defending or asserting control over a particular region.
definition.example: The dog became territorial when strangers approached its home.
